Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Bullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyBullet

    public class Bullet
extends Entity
    This Class can be used to create bullet objects
    Author:
    elan

      • Fields inherited from class Entity

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(Entity entity,
      int index)
        Cunstructor for the Bullet object
        Parameters:
        entity - Bullet will be created with same x, y, and angle as this entity
        index - Give the Bullet a unique index to identify it

      • Bullet

        public Bullet(Entity entity,
      int index,
      double angleDeviation)
        Cunstructor for the Bullet object
        Parameters:
        entity - Bullet will be created with same x, y, and angle as this entity
        index - Give the Bullet a unique index to identify it
        angleDeviation - this angle will be subtracted from the entity's angle and the bullet will be created with the resulting angle
